Customer(String, String, Double, Double) - Constructor for class com.revature.Objects.Customer

Customer(String, String) - Constructor for class com.revature.Objects.Customer

customerMenu(String, String) - Static method in class com.revature.AudiDealership.Driver
Displays the customer menu where a customer is given a choice to either view all the cars on the Audi dealership lot, make an offer on a Audi car that's on the lot, view the cars they've bought and the customer's payment records for that car, view their entire payment history, make a monthly payment on a car, or logout and return to the login menu.
